tool_description: Help you to decode Pseudonymized Facebook Identifiers (PFBIDs) to Facebook Identifiers (FBIDs)

api_list.name: Convert PFBID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-pfbids-converter1.p.rapidapi.com/pfbid/pfbid022pGY7agXcwjPvBUpP3Dh2k2B614JZCzPEKrpiQxKCCPiMqe8SSy4S7YFcCqV2dFSl"

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-pfbids-converter1.p.rapidapi.com/pfbid/{pfbid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facebook-pfbids-converter1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
